markdown: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [task](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsSeekerSlayerSurvivor/) in {{lax1}}. ## Synopsis The Surviving Face would have you infiltrate a temple of Woedica and remove a portion of a statue to the goddess of judgment. What could go wrong? ## Walkthrough * You can find the [Finger of the Exiled Queen](/fingerOfTheExiledQueen/) near the Woedica statue on the fourth floor of [Oathbinder's Sanctum](/oathbindersSanctum/), in the court room where you can rescue [Oswald](/oswald/) from the Woedican [Steel Garrote](/steelGarrote/) cultists. ## Trivia * Journal entry 10003 incorrectly states that the Watcher retrieved the finger from the "highest floor" of Oathbinder's Sanctum. The fourth floor is actually the lowest floor, since you start at the top of the pyramid (Level 1) and work your way down. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/LAX01_00_Arena_Island/LAX01_00_tsk_artifact_survivor_woedica_finger_statue.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''The Surviving Face's Hunt for the Finger of the Exiled Queen''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | The Surviving Face would have me infiltrate a temple of Woedica and remove a portion of a statue to the goddess of judgment. What could go wrong? |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Acquire the Finger of the Exiled Queen.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | The Surviving Face respects Woedica's endurance through her fall from power, yet the boar wants me to retrieve a part of a statue from within a place dedicated to the goddess. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Return the Finger of the Exiled Queen to the Pool of Memories.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | I acquired the Finger of the Exiled Queen from highest floor of the Oathbinder's Sanctum. If I'm to make use of it, I must return it to the Pool of Memories. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I added the Finger of the Exiled Queen to the Pool of Memories, unlocking new challenges from the Faces of the Hunt. |}

What could go wrong? ==Walkthrough== * You can find the [[Finger of the Exiled Queen]] near the Woedica statue on the fourth floor of [[Oathbinder's Sanctum]], in the court room where you can rescue [[Oswald]] from the Woedican [[Steel Garrote]] cultists. ==Trivia== * Journal entry 10003 incorrectly states that the Watcher retrieved the finger from the "highest floor" of Oathbinder's Sanctum. The fourth floor is actually the lowest floor, since you start at the top of the pyramid (Level 1) and work your way down. ==Journal== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/LAX01_00_Arena_Island/LAX01_00_tsk_artifact_survivor_woedica_finger_statue.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''The Surviving Face's Hunt for the Finger of the Exiled Queen''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | The Surviving Face would have me infiltrate a temple of Woedica and remove a portion of a statue to the goddess of judgment. What could go wrong? |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Acquire the Finger of the Exiled Queen.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | The Surviving Face respects Woedica's endurance through her fall from power, yet the boar wants me to retrieve a part of a statue from within a place dedicated to the goddess. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Return the Finger of the Exiled Queen to the Pool of Memories.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | I acquired the Finger of the Exiled Queen from highest floor of the Oathbinder's Sanctum. If I'm to make use of it, I must return it to the Pool of Memories. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I added the Finger of the Exiled Queen to the Pool of Memories, unlocking new challenges from the Faces of the Hunt. |}
title: The Surviving Face's Hunt for the Finger of the Exiled Queen
